summary: The Kremlin is a famous fortress in Moscow, Russia. It's like a big castle with walls, towers, palaces, and churches inside. It used to be where the Russian emperors lived, and now the Russian president lives there. You can visit the Kremlin and see the Grand Kremlin Palace, beautiful cathedrals, and learn about Russian history. Many people come to see this important place, which is also used to talk about the Russian government.
title: Kremlin
